Package ru.rsreu.kuznecovsokolov12.datalayer

Interface DeletedMessageDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OracleDeletedMessageDAO
    public interface DeletedMessageDAO
    This interface provides methods for interacting with a database table storing information about deleted messages.

    Implementations of this interface should handle the storage and retrieval of deleted messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addDeletedMessage​(DeletedMessage deletedMessage)
      Adds a deleted message to the table storing deleted messages in the database.
      DeletedMessage getDeletedMessage​(Message message)
      Gets a deleted message.
      void removeFromDeletedMessage​(DeletedMessage deletedMessage)
      Restores a deleted message and removes it from the deleted messages table.

    • Method Detail

      • addDeletedMessage

        void addDeletedMessage​(DeletedMessage deletedMessage)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a deleted message to the table storing deleted messages in the database.
        Parameters:
        deletedMessage - The deleted message to be added.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database exception error occurs.

      • removeFromDeletedMessage

        void removeFromDeletedMessage​(DeletedMessage deletedMessage)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Restores a deleted message and removes it from the deleted messages table.
        Parameters:
        deletedMessage - The deleted message to be restored.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.

      • getDeletedMessage

        DeletedMessage getDeletedMessage​(Message message)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets a deleted message.
        Parameters:
        message - The original deleted message to be gets.
        Returns:
        The deleted message corresponding to the original message, or null if not found.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.
